items.details:
Upcoming Tests

Social Studies - Chapter 3 December 10th (pages 84-136)
Math - Topic 7 - December 11th (Check the practice test)

Winter Festival Countdown!

The Winter Festival is coming up this Friday—only 3 more sleeps to go! We can’t wait to see everyone shine on stage.

It’s time to practice. Please watch the video below and keep practicing your part at home so we are ready for a great performance. Remember, it’s all about having fun! Don’t worry about getting every step perfect—just practice and enjoy it.

Please try to wear Christmassy clothes on the day of the festival if you can. Red and green are great choices.

Let’s get festival-ready and have an amazing time together. Go team!

Reading

Complete the definition paper by TOMORROW
The story this week is Nature's patchwork quilt

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6u5Y_Ln2imI

The spelling test is next Thursday! Please look at the vocabulary every day!

interdependence 
food chain
camouflage
adaptations 
quilt
patchwork
stitched
unique
niche
roots
shrimp
seashore
shallow
Arctic
ancestors

Extra reading ( I have added some new stories)

TO IMPROVE READING AND EMBED LEARNING, YOU SHOULD BE LOGGING INTO READWORKS

Please go to ReadWorks and complete some of the stories assigned. They will assist you with your schoolwork and also enhance your overall reading skills.

Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Math
The test is on Thursday. Please read over the red assessment pages we went over.

I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science 
Complete pages 140-141 in the science textbook (By Wednesday)
